class.name: EditorFile
class.brief_description: A file in the resource filesystem.
class.description: A more generalized, low-level variation of the file concept.

method.name: get_path
method.description: Returns the path to the file.

method.name: get_script_class_extends
method.description: Returns the base class of the script class defined in the file. If the file doesn't define a script class using the [code]class_name[/code] syntax, this will return an empty string.

method.name: get_script_class_name
method.description: Returns the name of the script class defined in the file. If the file doesn't define a script class using the [code]class_name[/code] syntax, this will return an empty string.

method.name: get_type
method.description: Returns the resource type of the file. This returns a string such as [code]"Resource"[/code] or [code]"GDScript"[/code], [i]not[/i] a file extension such as [code]".gd"[/code].

method.name: is_import_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the file imported properly.
